sections.title: Sanguine Angel (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Sanguine Angel class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Hardened Heart (Ex) (Sanguine Angel)
sections.description: Adds twice class level to the DC of Intimidate attempts against the sanguine angel, making her much harder to intimidate.

sections.title: Maiden’s Shield (Ex) (Sanguine Angel)
sections.description: Treats the sanguine angel as having Two-Weapon Fighting when using a longsword and shield, allowing access to TWF feat chains without prerequisites.

sections.title: Tyrant’s Discipline (Ex) (Sanguine Angel)
sections.description: Grants selectable combat disciplines every 2 levels starting at 2nd level, each providing unique tactical abilities and combat options.

sections.title: Armored Angel (Ex) (Sanguine Angel)
sections.description: Grants armor training class feature when wearing Gray Maiden plate, with levels stacking with other sources of armor training.

sections.title: Eye of Alertness (Su) (Sanguine Angel)
sections.description: Grants Alertness feat, +4 profane bonus on Will saves against illusions, and once per day can take Charisma damage to gain true seeing.

sections.title: Mystique (Ex and Sp) (Sanguine Angel)
sections.description: Provides +4 bonus on Diplomacy and Intimidate against same creature type, and once per day dominate person as a spell-like ability.

sections.title: Hollowness (Ex) (Sanguine Angel)
sections.description: Grants Diehard feat, +4 profane bonus on saves against emotion and pain effects, and immunity to fear effects.

sections.title: Angel of Death (Su) (Sanguine Angel)
sections.description: Changes creature type to evil extraplanar outsider, gains fire resistance 30, telepathy, see in darkness, and 50-foot fly speed with good maneuverability.
